# Document reading option keys

**API Collection**

Keys for constructing an attributed string from data on disk.

## Overview

Use these keys when you need to specify a key of type [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSAttributedStringDocumentReadingOptionKey].

## Getting document-wide attributes

- **NSTextScalingType**: Constants that specify the text scaling.

items.description: Constants that specify the text scaling.
items.name: NSTextScalingType
